message: I have a great product that I think you'll love, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but your price is a little high for me. Would you consider $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle at $100? That's a fair price.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $100 yet, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $115.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable here. $105 is my final offer. If you can't do that, I'll have to go with a different seller.
I've given you a good deal so far, and I'm not willing to go much lower. I'll meet you at $110, but that's as low as I can go.
